parameters.name: addonName
parameters.description: The name of the add-on. The name must match one of the names returned by DescribeAddonVersions.

parameters.name: addonVersion
parameters.description: The version of the add-on. The version must match one of the versions returned by DescribeAddonVersions.

nested_items.name: addonVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the add-on. The version must match one of the versions returned by DescribeAddonVersions.

nested_items.name: configurationSchema
nested_items.description: A JSON schema that's used to validate the configuration values you provide when an add-on is created or updated.

nested_items.name: podIdentityConfiguration
nested_items.description: The Kubernetes service account name used by the addon, and any suggested IAM policies. Use this information to create an IAM Role for the Addon.

nested_items.name: serviceAccount
nested_items.description: The Kubernetes Service Account name used by the addon.

nested_items.name: recommendedManagedPolicies
nested_items.description: A suggested IAM Policy for the addon.
